title: Rewards
body:
I got recently banned for flaming and now my 2 week ban expired... but i don't get any rewards lie keys or hex tech chests! There is written ' For your recently behavior your not having the chance to get a reward' or smth ike that... my question is: do i get no rewards for the rest of eternity or for like 2 weeks?
thank for answers and have a nice day

replies.body:
Hey, just to let you know this is the german forum. If you can write german you can write in german here^^

No you are not prohibited from rewards for eternity but you can recieve them for some time now. I dont know the exact time but dont expect it to be for just 2 weeks. I asume it will be a few months.

Otherwise if you keep up with a bad behavior you can also get permabanned so stay calm and think about your behavior.

Hier sollte alles wichtige drin stehen: 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/de/articles/209939463-Einschr%C3%A4nkungen-f%C3%BCr-die-Hextech-Werkstatt

> Die Dauer hängt von zwei Dingen ab:

>    * Härte der Bestrafung. Du erhältst für die Dauer der Bestrafung keine Beute, egal ob es sich um eine temporäre Sperre handelt oder eine Chateinschränkung.
   * Anzeichen für Besserung. Sobald die Strafe vorüber ist, kannst du weiterhin keine Beute verdienen, bis das System merkt, dass du **bedeutende Fortschritte hinsichtlich deines Verhaltens** gemacht hast.
